post.body: How true alison. I have first hand experience of this!
Wow! Chelsea you got some cool presents. I only got chocolate and Champagne and a huge Candle. Wear the dress at NY party!
thanks Mike for following me. I've always enjoyed your talks at IM seminars in London.
I'm done researching for the day. I think I turn in now. G'night all!
Amazing how you can come up with a great idea when you'r not even trying!
Good night tweeps. I am pooped!
Did I mention there is a christmas discount on my PLR super pack? check it out : http://www.plrrevenue.com/
Love your work @etsyjulianne
Reseaching keywords for a new website about Health and wellbeing. Any help or suggestions welcomed.
Just a quick tweet so my updates reach 100!! Happy Sunday my Friends!
The rain has stopped, my headache has gone and I am going to bed. Good night twitteres!
Still raining. Is it ever going to stop?
Dark, Dank and gloomy Saturday in London, been raining all day
3 am in London. The wind is Howling in my window and I can't sleep.... Again!
"Hell, there are no rules here - we're trying to accomplish something" well said by Thomas A. Edison don't you think?
Good night my tweety pies! It's past midnight and I am pooped.
"Any idiot can face a crisis - it's day to day living that wears you out". Anton Chekhov
Can't one enjoy a nice crisp winter evening without getting hurt?
Doesn't look too bad but hurts like hell!!
Fell over a parking post while looking at the moon and the magpies in the trees late this afternoon!
Aghhhhh! another sleepless night!
And the rest of the underdeveloped world for that matter.
Ok, now I am back to 59 followers again. What/s going on?!
I had 59 followers yesterday got notified 3 more followers and now I have 60. I think I need a lesson in maths!
How is it that people can still follow you even when their account has been suspended by twitter??!
Can't take any more of this Christmas food, drink and pudding! feel full up and drunk again third night in a row!
Ahhh, Sad news for literature/theatre/movie lovers. Just heard on the radio that Harold Pinter passed away..
Come on people! I'm just one away from 60 followers!! Christmas present if you please!
Wow! it's already been 6 hrs since i was here. Didn't notice the time for writing.
Well, Christmas if finally here! I think we'r having a grey one rather than a white one here in London! Merry Christmas tweeps!
Hi guys! haven't tweeted today, been kinda busy shopping, writing and counselling my firend.
Nearly midnight! I think I turn in. Goodnight my twittering friends.
How true @SeanAMcAlister. Totally agree with you
I would say happy Sunday but the day is nearly over for me and i've only been up a few hours. Needed to sleep having partied all night!
Just back from hairdressers, going to my last party before Christmas. I only missed two this year!
I'm really going now, it's nearly 2 am and I've things to do tomorrow.
Now it's goodnight from me! or should I say good morning!
1.28 am in London- Just finished my 3rd post on my new blog. Check it out http://www.lifesabeachafter50.com
Here's a good one: "Old age is like everything else. To make a success of it, you've got to start young". Theodore Roosevelt
Don't just wish you had a button on your head that could switch off your brain so you could go to sleep?
